website_summaries.verdict: Time-saving, hands-free spot cleaner with solid reviews for performance and effectiveness.
pros: Consumers appreciate the hands-free feature of this spot cleaner and praise its ability to get out tough stains and do a deep clean
cons: Holding tank can be difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rug cleaner I have ever owned. I have a new puppy who pees everywhere. Especially after she already went outside. And of course her favorite place to pee is in the hallway. I bought this rug cleaner and a black light and was surprised to find so many spots. I'm adding pictures to show how well this cleans. You do need to run deep clean for pee spots but the cycle is 6 minutes and the tank lasts for 3 deep cleans. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgamer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for any stain, esp. pets
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. I was shocked. My dogs had a severe diarrhea blowout from getting into some people food and garbage. My carpet looked beyond repair. We used the cleaning solution that came with it and also used Nature's Miracle Carpet Shampoo liquid. I am sold on the Spot Bot. It is fabulous and gets out any set in stain. Look at my pictures. Not a trace left and we didn't have to do a thing but move the machine to a different spot when it was done. No work for us!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: maybe because you (Amazon) does not publish bad reviews, like the Bissell Pet Eraser
customer_reviews.text: So far not impressed, so tired of using Amazon, no technical support from the Bissell, and the products don't work as advertised? Instructions are vague. Not sure why these products get high results, maybe because you (Amazon) does not publish bad reviews, like the Bissell Pet Eraser, have not had that for six month's and already does not work??? Amazon, STOP, don't cut off the customer, cut off the "Seller".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all over floor!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks liquid all over my floors when turned off and not in use. Dripping constantly from the rubber scrub brush. Customer service was unresponsive to my repeated emails. Returned for refund after two uses. Really disappointed. Left wet 'crop circles' in my carpet. Looked awful after each use. Quite a heavy vacuum. Not convenient for daily use which I needed it for. Surprised at the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't suck up all the water it spits out leaving my ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't suck up all the water it spits out leaving my carpet with an even larger dirty wet spot. I bought this to keep a new white carpet clean, and instead in have a series of alien crop circles on my carpet. Using the attached hose does help the situation, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bissell has such a great idea with this little machine but they have really disappointed me by making it so cheap. They leak before too long and the hose will crack and stop working. We have gone through 3 of these now. I kept hoping that it was just my bad luck but after this last one I can clearly see that Bissell has really failed on its customers. I hope someday they decide to make these better quality, in the meantime, hopefully another company will make one similar to this that will actually last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again nor recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: The Spot bot looked really cool and easy to use out of the box although very loud, a lot more than expected. The cleaner fluids were easy to mix and add to machine. My biggest concern was that the quick clean setting doesn't suck up enough of the water. Also it doesn't remove dog urine stain/smell as advertised using any of it cleaners including the ones with OXY in it. Either separate or premixed. And I have tried all of their cleaners. It also leaks from the fill bucket. The Spot Bot is a really cool idea but the build quality and advertised performance is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for puppies.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bichon frise puppy who leaves stains wherever she roams. I purchased this in an attempt to save my sanity. Oh does it work! There are a few deep-set-in stains that haven't disappeared completely, but I think a second treatment will fix them. The rest of the stains are gone. I have a white fur rug in my bedroom that I thought I had to throw out. It is now spotless. It is almost fun to use ... far better than hands and knees, scrubbing. (I think I am sane again)
customer_reviews.author: JudyWren

customer_reviews.title: Works, but..................
customer_reviews.text: The product works quite well for its intended purpose, removing pet "accidents" and stains from carpets. However, as noted in at least one other review, the product has an inherent defect in its hose. The way the hose is designed, it is intended that the hose wrap around the SpotBot for storage. The fit is quite tight, resulting in premature cracking/splitting of the hose, thus rendering the device unable to adequately suction. It does not appear to be readily replaceable. Hence my 3 star rating. (I will probably purchase another in spite of the defect.)
customer_reviews.author: Edwin A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The automatic scrubbing feature is what got us hooked on it. When the first on died, we figured it was our fault for using some vinegar in it for treating pet droppings. Nope....the second one just died and we used nothing but Bissell products in it. Plus....both units would leave the floor soaked when using the automatic scrubber. I was told just to use the hose to get the balance of the water up! Really? Run the automatic then use the hose? We just started using the hose only. Have only used the automatic scrubber a few times and it still died in 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hubler

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of my money!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month and now we found a slow leak when noticing the carpet being wet around it. I'm so bummed because I don't think I can return it since it's been a couple months. I had other pet spotbots, one the hose eventually cracks so it had an electrical tape around it. Hoped this one was better but not even close since it's already leaking!!
customer_reviews.author: mnaks

customer_reviews.title: Base leaks on 1st use!!!! Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Received my spotbot today. I read the instructions, filled the tank with the proper water and cleaning solutions. I put the spotbot over the stain, turned it on and it worked but I noticed water leaking out of the baae of the unit! Checked all the fittings and being a New item everything checked out. Tightened the caps. Turned it back on still leaks. So the spotbot will be returned! This is super aggravating for a brand new item!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a year
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a tool one uses every day in their cleaning. I have probably used mine a handful of times since purchasing in August 2017. It's now March 2019 and it broke last month when I pulled it out one night to use it after a sick child. The sprayer at the end of the hose completely fell apart. I think something may have always been wrong with it because it always leaked after I put it away and I've never had that happen with any of the spot machines I've owned before. I love the products normally, so I'm not sure if I got a defective one or if they don't make them like they used to. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I was undecided whether to get brand name Hoover or Bissell, after reading many reviews I decided on this model, and I’m glad I did. This vacuum cleaner is fantastic. It cleaned up an accident in my bedroom by my new puppy and also sanitised my carpet. My carpet was left spot free and smelled fresh and clean. Best yet, my carpet wasn’t soaked or drenched in water after the cleaning. An absolute must have for pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: SY214Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Flawless use for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats and a Dog and anyone who knows cats, they spit something up at least once a week if not more. Hair balls, pieces of carpet fiber. I could go on and on. Our dog (65 lb lab) doesn't throw up often but when he does it's a bit larger than the cat equivalent ;). This spot cleaner works flawlessly. In fact, I'm was inspired to write this review because I'm using it to clean up from our sick cat (pancreatitis episode) right now. Working great right now. Yes, the kitty is pulling through this episode but might be diabetic now as a result. At least we still have her. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!! If I could rate it a -20 I would.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this. It worked great for about 10 runs. Then it QUIT. Lights came on, but the machine did nothing. I contacted Amazon . They made me take it to a local repair shop where it stayed for more almost four months. Finally I was told the replacement board needed was not available and that Amazon had sent a replacement. That machine worked about a month and sprang a leak in the bottom of the machine spilling water all over the floor. This machine is a total piece of junk. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. Buy something else. I certain am.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdCoastCC

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Handy when needed
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Almost a little too well! Cleaned pet stain but left a clean spot considerably whiter than the rest of the carpet around it! The handheld attachment is better because you control exactly how much it is cleaning. We’ve learned to use that rather than the spot clean feature. But if you have already very clean carpets I’m sure the spot clean would work great. I deducted one star just because it is a little cumbersome to keep filling the tank and pour in the right amount of chemicals and such.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best spot vacuum on the market
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this model of spotbot At least 15 years ago and used it into the ground until it finally gave out. We purchased a brand new one through Amazon recently. It works great as well. Since most spot carpet cleaners are going to a brush head in the unit only with no hose or vise/versa. This dual unit seems to be the last of a dying breed.
customer_reviews.author: specwardude

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted, but didn't last long enough
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this machine. It worked well. Cleaned very well. I didn't like that hair got stuck in the clear window on the brush, but whatever. That didn't stop it from doing a good job. If I had reviewed it after one year, it would have been 4-5 stars. I'm seriously disappointed that it didn't last more than 2 years though. It suddenly started leaking all over. I don't think I should have to repurchase this every 2 years. I'm trying a different machine this time.
customer_reviews.author: Faolan447

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: We've used this all around our new house for our new puppies accident clean up, but the real test came when puppy peed on our mattress. Spotbot came through and we stripped the bed and it cleaned it up perfect leaving no trace behind.
customer_reviews.author: msavy29

customer_reviews.title: Verified that the outlet was good. Contact Amazon and they quickly replaced it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and after one use it appeared to overheat and stop working. When it is plugged in it gave no indication of having power. Verified that the outlet was good. Contact Amazon and they quickly replaced it. When I received the next Spotbot, I was using it again and it appears overheated again and again stopped working. The Spotbot again gives no indication of power again. Verified that the outlet was good. Wish I would have returned it when I had the chance, don't make the mistake I made.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Good until it leaks all over your floor
customer_reviews.text: Was ok at first other than you have clean circles that don't match the rest of the carpet. Within a year it started leaking heavily. So every amount of water you suck up, it leaks out dirty water back onto the carpet. Great concept but terrible engineering, manufacturing and execution.
customer_reviews.author: Darren C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine!!
customer_reviews.text: So far this machine has been worth every penny. We have an older cat with IBS so he vomits and sometimes drags feces across the house. The Spot Bot cleans it up wonderfully, like it was never there. (we let vomit dry and vacuum it first). I seriously love it. It will clean about 5 times on the "quick setting" before it needs more water and solution. Definitely recommend buying extra bottles of solution with the machine, the ones it comes with are tiny and disappear fast. I also recommend using a brush on the cleaned spot afterward or the carpet will stay in a circular spot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Robben

customer_reviews.title: If you have a pet that likes to potty where they shouldn't then this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned like 3 of these and I've had to replace them a few times because my dogs are REALLY NAUGHTY and I've had to use them a lot in the past few years. The SpotBot cleans really well and I like the scent of the cleansing solution. I've used it on rugs, sofas and mattresses. Yes, my dogs are little jerks. But yes, I highly recommend the SpotBot. Just make sure you rinse out everything out completely after each use or you will have to deal with some nasty leftover water.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Mai

customer_reviews.title: Got for my cats
customer_reviews.text: Got for my cats as it seems I am always cleaning up throw up. One has some tummy issues so does it often and with having 3, it happens a good amount anyway. I felt I could not clean them well on my own with a paper towel and cleaner and this is nicer than me sitting there scrubbing. I just put it on and leave. I have used it a bunch already. The only complaint is it still leaves the carpet a little on the crunchy side, not sure why cause it seems clean. We shall see how it holds up to the use though. I did also choose Bissel since they donate to animals when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great buy, especially after adopting a puppy. After using paper towels and natures miracle I feel it wasn't doing the job. I decided to purchase this and then get the carpets professionally cleaned, it has kept my carpets clean and fresh. Very easy to use and easy to clean. The only thing I would say could be better is the suction on the auto-cycles could run for a little longer, it tends to leave the carpet wetter than I would like. Once the cycle is over I use the hand hose to suck up the extra water. All in all a fantastic purchase !
customer_reviews.author: MaMaEggs

customer_reviews.title: Unless you only need for a couple moths, save your money
customer_reviews.text: This machine was amazing until it started smelling like mildew. And not just a mild stink, i mean smells up the whole half of the house where it’s placed in a closet. I’ve followed all the suggested cleaning methods but no dice. It can’t be good that i can see hair and funk built up in the hose that you cannot clean. I really wanted to love this, but after having 3 months it’s garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this little machine is the scrubbing action: and for those who are not accustomed to using old fashioned cleaning products, and introduction to hydrogen peroxide as a cleaning product. The cleaning cycle is long, the machine is noisey, the suction is ineffective. A microfiber cloth and a small amount of dish detergent, hydrogen peroxide, and hot water are more effective, quieter and remarkably cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: I have a doggie day care business
customer_reviews.text: I have A doggie day care business in my home and boy do I love this product. We’d love to get water proof floors but for now we have carpeting in every room of our home but the kitchen. We mostly watch small dogs so as you can imagine accidents happen on a daily basis. I hated dragging out my full size carpet cleaner every week. With the Spotbot I can easily clean a spot in minutes and it does a great job! Once the machine is done I do need to take an old rag and dry the spot a little but it’s worth the extra effort to have clean carpets in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Land

customer_reviews.title: That was all in my carpet? Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously beyond amazed. I have a kitten who misses the litter box. I thought I had been cleaning accidents up well. Clearly I was not. I was beyond amazed at what this machine pulled out of my carpet. Everytime I was sure it got it all & I did one last go over more urine would get pulled up. Yellow urine. For a small machine just doing spots I was amazed. I wonder now if their big full size ones actually work this good. Beyond happy I bought this product. Will update if there are any issues going forward but I'm impressed & have already told all my friends w/ pets.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, leaked & now broken pump
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2013, used it about a dozen times in 2 years & the pump has gone out. Only has a 1 year warranty so it's not covered. Also leaked all over my hardwood closet floor when I put it away with solution in the tank & didn't suction alot of the liquid out of the carpet on hands free always had to go over the spot with the hand held nozzle. This is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Brinson

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets, kids or are just clumsy, this will be a carpet saver!
customer_reviews.text: I own a full size carpet cleaner, but this item is just a necessity if you have kids, pets, or are just clumsy. Fill the tank with cleaning solution, plug it in, set it on the carpet where the spill occurred, push the button and walk away. It cleans the spots very well. It has options for surface level stains or deep stains. It's easy to remove both the clean water and dirty water tanks. The clean water tank has fill lines for water, then another line to show how much cleaner and boost to add to the tank. The dirty water tank is easy to remove, drain and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we’ve had this less than a year and it’s already broken. We went through each part but it just stopped working- a bit disappointed. It works well went it works but less than a year life span isn’t worth the cost. We only used it maybe 6 times within that time frame. We had the exact same one a couple years back and it only lasts about a year too. It’s such a convenient machine- I wish it worked better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: We have had 2 spot cleaners and 1 or 2 carpet cleaners in the past and all have left some residue of the pet stain of the day on our carpet. We had just thrown the last of the spot cleaners away and I found an amazing spray that was helping with the puppy housebreaking when our 7 year old lab had a vomiting issue, on both floors of grey and tan carpet. The spots were HUGE and by the time we ordered this unit and it arrived, the stain was starting to set. The SpotBot cleaned and lifted both stains out that you can not tell there was a huge mess! I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: HollyB

customer_reviews.title: A must for pets!!!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOODNESS!!! If u have pets, u need this. I have a few old stains, completely dried diarrhea poop that was was hidden in a room we don't use. When I found it , it was petrified (nice visual, huh). I couldn't even scrape it up...I thot what the heck, it's worth a try. Stain is completely gone...carpet looks brand new, it even fluffs it back up!! U might have to pick up a few wet poop pieces but other than that, this baby is amazing. I am wondering where this has been all my life!! 5 stars!!! HALLELUJAH!! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: My MIL has one and swears by it. I have a small dog who has accidents somewhat frequently and this works great! I’d definitely recommend this. No kids yet, but I’m sure this would work just as well for there messes too. I love the set it and go feature. That’s probably my favorite part. No need to stand there and do it yourself. One press of a button and you can walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: So easy!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea!! I have several spots around my house from many years of fostering cats; some are old and set in and others more fresh. I love that I can easily fill this and set it on the spot an go! I'm not sure the solution they sent with it (Bissell Spot and Oxy) are doing the trick so I will try other cleaners. But the machine itself is great! SUPER easy to fill and empty! No complicated latches; just grab and lift! Uses hot water from the faucet. One button for deep set stains, another for surface. Wish the "spot" it cleans were bigger, but I'm sure it's adequate for most. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!! will NOT disappoint
customer_reviews.text: We had our carpet cleaned professionally a week before I purchased this,my old one finally bit it after 15 wonderful years. This new and improved model is the bomb! Our dog had diarrhea on our practically new carpet,so we called a professional,the next day the stains were back,then this bad boy was delivered,I went over the stains and they`re completely gone and the waste tank water was brown,I could not believe it.I highly recommend this product.Way to go Bissell!!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: this replaced an older spot bot that simply died after about 8 years. I really like this machine- I have yet to find something that it can't pick up if spilled quickly- this includes red wine and wing sauce. Be careful with which chemicals you use and how much- you could end up with an obvious "disc of clean" on your carpet after young this. I do not use the hose attachment much- on stairs a few times and it does work. I would like if they made some type of attachment that spins and works well for a car
customer_reviews.author: JWL

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second spotbot that we have owned and both have the same leaking problem. You can not keep the cleaning solution tank full for on demand use, as it leaks out all over the place. This problem happened on both units straight out of the box from day 1. Bissell needs to figure out a solution to this problem before selling any more of these units! Stay away from this until Bissell gets thier act together!
customer_reviews.author: Lucien M.

customer_reviews.title: Save your self the money and just throw a bucket of water on your carpet.
customer_reviews.text: What a waste! I had a spot bot years and years ago and it was great so as my dog has gotten older andI had the need for a carpet spot cleaner, I didn't hesitate to order another one. Unfortunately, this one is not like the old one. It doesn't do anything for the stain and leaves behind so much water!!! The few times I tried to use it I found myself soaking up water with towels after the machine was done. Save your self the money and just throw a bucket of water on your carpet, it will produce the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Katie from the 603

customer_reviews.title: My rugs have never looked better or been easier to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Keeping up with the spots from pets, guests and the occasional spills really makes your carpet look nicer between cleanings. I've even taken it to work to get spots out of the carpet there so we didn't have to rent a machine. It's easy to use, easy to flush out and small to store. I would never go back to the big upright again because it isn't as versatile. If we want to do large areas twice a year we rent a machine. The rest of the time this little one does everything we need on a multitude of surfaces. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was way over priced, but took a chance. This is the best thing I have bought in at least 2 years! It cleans up after my elderly cat with chronic diarrhea and stool incontinence like it was water on a linoleum floor. It takes 6 min for the deep set in stain cycle that cleaned a mess that had hardened for 2 days in the CA heat. Six minutes and it was gone with no trace left behind! The amount of money I will be saving in paper towels every week is going to be great! Never having to spend time following my cat around on clean up patrol, PRICELESS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Princess

customer_reviews.title: Cleans stains but leaks after a few weeks....
customer_reviews.text: I will change my review when I receive the replacement. But for now, be aware... this thing leaks like crazy! Our little puppy has peed on the carpet a few times and it has worked great for the first 2 weeks. But now anytime we suck anything up (either the handle or the automatic cleaner), it leaks out from the bottom back onto the carpet. Aside from the leak, this product does a wonderful job at cleaning stains. Leaves the carpet smelling fresh. Here's to hoping the replacement has no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - Won’t last more than 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the Bissell sportbot pet carpet cleaner if you want it to last more than 1 year. I purchased one and it broke at 1 year to the day. The hose that suction’s the water up from the dirty surface cracked and broke, preventing any suction from picking up the dirty water. The plastic hose is too rigid and when wrapped and unwrapped around the machine for use it will evently crack. My sister bought one too and she has already replaced the hose two times in two years! Clearly there’s a manufacturing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really does a great job of getting dog stains out
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have 3 dogs and just got a puppy. We received this a few days ago. I ordered it because one of my senior dogs pooped on the carpet and it was liquid and I could not get the stain completely out. I put this on the stain, totally gone (along with new puppy stains). I would highly recommend this product, you just put it down and let it do it's job. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've also used it on my couch and it works great there too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2012 because my elderly cat was vomiting all over our new carpet. This thing has saved the carpet. It's now 3 years later and although my cat has since passed this thing is still going strong. I've used it on the carpet and there are no stains where the kitty vomited. I've also used it on my couch and it works great there too. Highly recommend. I would suggest you buy a replacement attachment for the hose because mine broke pretty quickly and you don't notice until you actually go to use it. A replacement hose attachment is less than $10 so worth the extra cost to save the hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: Best spot cleaning machine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine! It is perfect because we are house training a puppy. Love the smell of the carpet cleaner that comes with it. Lightweight and not too loud. Super easy to use. You literally set it over the stain, touch a button, walk away and it goes to work. Look how much dirt was sucked up in just this small area!!!! Best spot cleaning machine I’ve ever owned. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dfly3770

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again or recommend
customer_reviews.text: This worked good for a while. Emptying the dirty water is tricky and if you don’t empty on the rounded side, you’ll dump nasty water on yourself and your floor. After a few months of use, it started leaking or something, as it’s leaving round dirty rings on my floor instead of cleaning the mess. I have a large carpet cleaner and had to use it to clean up the mess this machine left. At first, it was a dream come true with puppies. Then it left a mess of its own. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: After having this less than a year, I hardly use it. Most of the time it doesn’t want to run and I have to take it apart and put it back together several times befor it sorts that out. When using any of the spot cleaning settings it seems to only make the carpet look worse. Though it seems to be getting dirty water out of the rug it seems like it doesn’t get enough water out to make it look clean so I have to go over it with a towel. The only function that works well is the hose which does work well to clean the stairs or upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really clean as well as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Got the bissel cleaning liquid and mixed it correctly in accordance with the instructions. When I put on a spot - turned it on - made sure it was suctioned correctly, it just didn't clean any spot I tried to us it on. I'm not happy with this item at all and I would not recommend. Unfortunately, by the time I first had need and used this machine to try and clean a spot - it was already to late to return this.
customer_reviews.author: BWeb

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply-made and stops working constantly. My second Bissell spotbot ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply-made and stops working constantly. My second Bissell spotbot. I have 2 short-haired chihuahuas. After the first one stopped providing any suction after only a few tries, I learned my lesson and bit the bullet and bought a new one, only after purchasing an additional extended warranty. After one use, the new one stopped providing suction. Then, it magically healed itself to complete the job. Two months later, I pull it out for its 3rd use and found out the sprayer nozzle now doesn't spray and just dribbles. There is no removable part to be able to pop off and on to clean hair out of the hose. The product is temperamental, inconsistent and basically unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This works good, if you have a small spot and your carpets are really clean. But for the rest of us... Whenever we use it, it seems to do a good job cleaning. The problem is that after it dries, you can usually see a bright spot where it cleaned and a dark ring where the brush scrubbed water, but the machined was not able to suck up the dirt and water. We have another hand held, that takes a little more work, but it definitely doesn't leave the rings because you are able to suck up all the water. I would recommend the BISSELL SpotLifter 2X Portable Deep Carpet Cleaner. Cheaper and overall a better clean
customer_reviews.author: Huskie

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpet clean ups anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a spotbot given as a gift 9 years ago. The last held up well and my sister used it a lot for carpet spills/stains with no issues., especially in the stationary mode. Although most of the spotbots say “pet” the original one did not and for anyone who has kids you will find this great for common carpet spills or stains. I find Bissel products I have bought last a long time so this purchase was an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective cleaner and machine broke after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: This unit broke after 15 months of light use. It was probably only used 15-20 times. It leaves a circle where it "spot cleans" and doesn't rinse completely even though I used the proper amount of solution and only bought the Bissell solution recommended. The machine is also very loud when cleaning. I will not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DaBearsGal

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed- leaked after just 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Update 7-5-2017: I have decided to try another brand of portable carpet cleaner. This is the third Bissell SpotBot that I have owned and the third one that has started to leak due to faulty construction and bad seals. This third one lasted just two months before it started to leak. Not under excessive use, this machine was used reasonably and for what it was specified for, and it just didn't hold up. It seems as though the manufacturers have tried to manufacture this product on the cheap, with little attention to quality or longevity of the machine. Needless to say I'm extremely disappointed and I will never buy another Bissell SpotBot again. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS SPOT BOT - IT WILL LEAK AND THE PART TO FIX IT IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: This junk broke within 1 year of owning it. Unfortunately I threw it away because after extensive research and calls to Bissel, the part that would fix the leaking issue was no longer in production!! How stupid is that? I'll never buy another Bissel product again without a warranty. Absolute JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hubrich

customer_reviews.title: works great to clean pet stains
customer_reviews.text: three to six times per tank depending on deep or surface clean, respectively; the reason I replaced mine was due to loss of suction but this was after a few years of heavy use with a cat with IBS. can set and walk away for a few minutes! heavy but I imagine easier to use than a regular carpet cleaner. wish I knew how to clean the suction tank
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine HATE that the hose
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine HATE the hose! The hose design/quality needs some serious upgrading. After just over one year of use, the hose has a tear where it attaches to the base rendering the machine useless. The problem is that the hose does not seem to be long enough to accommodate wrapping around the unit for storage without causing major stress on the hose which ultimately results in a tear. After reading some threads online this is a common problem. I tried contacting Bissell for a replacement hose however they do not offer them. The did offer to sell me a new machine with a whopping 10% discount. Going to purchase a hose online and see if it can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, needs better suction.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spot cleaner but after it is done you'll need to use the hose attachment to suck up any excess water as it doesn't have the best of sections when doing the self cleaning part. Other than that we love this new tool for our house of 3 dogs. On a side note the have tool is small and we are afraid it might break if we push too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Valoree

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger walk behind Bissell carpet cleaner and it works great. However it was a pain to pull out and use on a small spot.........so this SpotBot has been a blessing after one of the cats has an upset stomach, or my old cat not being able to get to the litter box in time. This machine has removed old stains and new stains and it is so light weight and easy to use!! I love it.......
customer_reviews.author: Lynda V

customer_reviews.title: it was being sucked up the hose and spat directly back onto the ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET THIS DEVICE! I have had two of them within the past ~2 months, the second being Amazon's replacement for the first. After several successful cycles of fill-and-empty, each of them started leaking a flood of >>dirty water<< from the bottom, just within 2 weeks of my starting to use it! (Liquid vacuumed up stopped flowing in the waste-water container: it was being sucked up the hose and spat directly back onto the floor, out the bottom.) I'm not sure if this is crap American design or crap Chinese manufacturing. But AVOID THIS PRODUCT! If I could give it ZERO STARS, I would!
customer_reviews.author: TxnQ

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Product EVER MADE for a Pet Owner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made life worth living again! My 2 doxy pups were not getting the whole house breaking concept, and were ruining the carpet in our new place, which was breaking my spirit!!! I ordered the Spot Bot in a desperate, grasping-at-straws effort to address the issue, and Lo and behold, it is the miracle device I needed to save my home and sanity! Thank you Bissell, you are an answer to pet owner prayers! I also have the Bissell Crosswave, which is another lifesaver, but the Spotbot is so quick and easy it is a better "daily" solution. Also highly recommend the Bissell cleaning solutions. Would buy again, and have already recommended to friends with messy pets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great till it caught on fire!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with great expectations. Worked wonderfully for a few months. After setting it on a carpet spot and walking away while it cleaned, I began to smell smoke in the next room. The motor in this unit had blown and caught fire, sending heavy white smoke throughout the room. I immediately unplugged it and let it wind down. After contacting the manufacturer, I was more than disappointed that they did nothing, other than tell me it was out of warranty. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: BzeeMom

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: There are only two rooms left with carpet in our house. We needed to replace our shampooer but did not see the need to go with a large machine. This does a great job with spot cleaning, and the best part (for this busy mom) is I can just set it on the spot when the dog pees and leave the room, it will clean it all for me.
customer_reviews.author: K Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Zero to none vacuum
customer_reviews.text: From the start, this vacuum didn't have any vacuum at all. it's zero to none. Immediately returning and exchanging it with my old one model 3640. My old model works really well, strong vacuum, large capacity but after so many years of service the hose broke. I'm buying another one anyway because of functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ilander525

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Waste of money! Does not properly work,  not even close!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge waste of money and time! it does not even get out simple fresh spills that can be cleanedby hand! this machine does nothing except for fill your home with a loud noise and soak your carpet! I would not recommend this product to anyone! if I am ever to buy bissell products again I will use more caution, I thought because bissell was a great brand I wouldn't have the issues I'm having! DO NOT WASTE UR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: B&V82

customer_reviews.title: This machine is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a new puppy. I bought the Bissel spot Bot to keep me off my knees scrubbing the carpet when my puppy went there. I just keep the "formula" in the container, set the machine over the spot and push the button. Unfortunately, I have to do this several times a day. No fault of the machine, the fault is mine for taking on a new puppy. Be sure and buy more formulas when you purchase the machine. What comes with the machine is two small bottles of two different products. Amazon has good prices on the refils.
customer_reviews.author: Kaaren J. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Just clean the carpet
customer_reviews.text: After using this machine several times, I would not have purchased if I would have seen how it works. It covers a small area, about 8" diameter. Useful for small clean ups. Took several moves of the machine to cover all the soiled areas. When complete, it left behind about 50% of the water it put down; carpet wet to touch. Got out our normal carpet cleaner and finished the job. Better off buying another brand of carpet cleaner for the same money.
customer_reviews.author: wander what you're doing?

customer_reviews.title: Worked well through the first puppy, but did not last through a second
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shortly before our first puppy arrived. It saw her through housebreaking and took care of a few additional spills and accidents over the next several months. But after 14 months, just as our second puppy arrived, the hose stopped being able to spray. It still has suction, and the no-hands cleaner works, but we can no longer use the hose to quickly clean a small or irregularly shaped spill, or use it on stairs or furniture. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: The hose works a bit better, until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the circular brush on the bottom does help clean the soiled area, but it also makes a glaringly obvious ring on the rug or carpet. And that ring doesn't seem to go away. It just stays... discolored. The hose works a bit better, until it breaks. And it WILL break. And when it does break, there seems to be no way to replace it, so you're stuck wrapping duct tape around the hose where it meets the base. Good luck with all that.
customer_reviews.author: The Grand Falloon

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and foolproof.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and foolproof operation! I have two young puppies who have had a few accidents on their way to housebreaking, and I have had cleanup failures (left too much disinfectant in the carpet in one place, causing staining; didn't sufficiently clean up a second spot, which left the puppies investigating the scene of the crime and tempted to re-violate the space). This seems to have managed both situations quite handily. Set it over the spot, push the right button and let it do its job! The discard tank was proof of how much it cleaned out of these carpets! Worth every penny, to me!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sottile

customer_reviews.title: Think I got a dud.
customer_reviews.text: Think I got a dud. The machine leaves too much water in the carpet when finished. Years ago I purchased one of these and it worked well for all of one year before it died. Carpet was nearly dry when it finished. This new one seems wimpy and leaves more liquid in the carpet than my aging golden retriever. I was willing to try another Spotbot despite the short life span, but alas back it goes and the dog wash tool too. Can’t use the tool without the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Did an amazing job and got all the pee stains out!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and it is getting all the spots out that I have been trying for months to get out with different methods. Black light would show how the stains are still there. After putting the spotbot on the stains cleared it completely out. Very pleased with it so far. Only gave it a 4 star as I would prefer the cleaning head a tad bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dachshund Owners:
customer_reviews.text: Have a dachshund? You may want to buy two of these... For the days your dachshund doesn't wish to relieve themselves outside because it is: Too cold Raining Grass is too long Grass has dew on it Someone four blocks away is doing something that they don't like Snowing Drizzle Foggy
customer_reviews.author: Viver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this a couple of times so can't speak to logevity of use but it's a great cleaner. It gets right in and does a really thorough scrub of the area. Absolutely better for spot cleaning opposed to doing a full room but gets down way further into the pile of the carpet than other residential level carpet cleaners that I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa D Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is usually great with asking to go out and not making a mess in the house BUT once in awhile, especially when he has a guest there will be problems... This machine removes new AND old messes like they were never there! Only use COLD maybe warm water but not hot!!! this is a consumer product NOT professional so its parts are not made to withstand extremes. I would highly recommend this product "SpotBot Pet handsfree Spot and Stain Cleaner with Deep Reach Technology 33N8" is the model we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner works, I have two cats that create stains on carpet from time to time, when it happens I simply pick up what I can with paper of fabric towel and then set the machine on the stain and let it do it's thing. Sometimes takes 2-3 applications, but for the most part works great.
customer_reviews.author: yaniman

customer_reviews.title: No more face hovering over poop and puke.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. One epileptic dog and a hairball puking cat; truly an easy to operate sanity saver. Fill it with cleaner, click a button and walk away. Voila, 5 minutes later. Or use handheld brush. All easy to operate. Steep price worth it. 3 year lifespan after heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: jbeaner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog messes - set it and walk away - you don't have to stand over it
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT ! hands down better than the bigger ones that you have to stand there and run the end over the spot over and over ... fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for pet stains
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunction with the Bissell pet stain remover and the Bissell Oxy Boost product this cleaner worked fantastic! I love how you set it up and let it do it's thing! You do only get about 3 spot treatments before you must refill with cleaner but that's no big deal. And I am very very happy about the outcome - stains and smells are gone!
customer_reviews.author: april showers

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have used this many times to get pet stains out of carpet (old, absorbent carpet - yuck!). It works really well at removing the stains, but I wish the rotating (circle) part was a bit wider because you have to sometimes position it multiple times for the same stain (if it is bigger). Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: ... water but what i couldn't deal with was the dirty water tank leaking all over the floor when i ...
customer_reviews.text: I could deal with the leaking from the machine and the fact that it left the area very wet so I would have to use the hose to soak up the excess water but what i couldn't deal with was the dirty water tank leaking all over the floor when i remove it to empty. For the price you would think it would be better made.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. To keep it from smelling mildewy (from what I read in some complaints) I take the water tank off and rinse out and dry the dirty tank after every use. The deep clean setting does use a fair amount of water/solution. You can go 3 or 4 deep clean cycles before needing to refill the water/solution. Someone also mentioned cleaning the tanks with dawn dish soap. I bought some just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bihm

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppy messes
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small non-professional unit. A must have for anyone with a puppy. It’s a set it and forget it kinda deal. Cleans well. Kind of loud but has never woken our kids. This is a “cant live without” in our house and we recommend it to anyone who is getting a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: SmalltownMomma

customer_reviews.title: Loses suction over time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this one for 3.5 years now. It was great for spot-treating and took all the stains out. At this point, itms starting to lose suction and not getting all the stains out. Carpets are white, so it’s easy to see. I started using a Bissell carpet shampooer and it gets everything out, if I go over it 2-3 times. For what it’s worth, it doesn’t last a long time so I’m looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cornflower

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of a lot of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I used cleaner as directed and used enclosed factory recommended solutions. There was no improvement in cleanliness and carpet was sopping wet for over 24 hours even after soaking up with towels and running a fan on area.
customer_reviews.author: gospel singer

customer_reviews.title: Great in removing tough spots!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to tackle some spots that our regular rug cleaner couldn’t get up. It has got every single spot up, from dog accidents to spilt tea. The only con I have to say about it is it does leave the spot pretty wet. I just use an old towel to soak up the excess. I just love that I can put it over a spot and walk away. I’m not down on my hands and knees scrubbing and I don’t have to get the big rug cleaner out either. It’s great. I have not tried the hose attachment yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!. Junk product.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Had it a few weeks and the dirty water container started to leak at the seal. It dumps water all over the carpet and then fails to pickup about 70% of the water so you have to use the hand tool to do most the work anyways. Not recommended. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: LISA MEINE

customer_reviews.title: Great For Quick Cleanups
customer_reviews.text: This has worked so well on pet stains, both old and new. It is so much easier than schlepping out my big carpet cleaner. It's quick, efficient, easy to clean and put away. The only limitation is the size and shape of the brush. My dog likes to run to a wall and puke right up against the baseboard. It's hard to get the round brush up against a flat wall and clean it in one shot. Sometimes I have to do it twice, side by side, or use the hand tool. The hand tool works best on stains that haven't dried or set in since it doesn't have a motorized brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jill McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2d spot bot I purchased. I have 2 cats who constantly throw up. The spot bot was my miracle solution. BUT it has a very short shelf life. The first machine stopped working properly 18 months after I purchased it. It didn't suck up the water and I would sop up the water with large towels. I purchased my second spot bot about 18 months ago, also after the warranty expired. When I went to lift it up, it completely detached from the body!!! So beware. The convenience is great. When the machine works, it is great.... but it falls apart after a year.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE P.

customer_reviews.title: Does an amazing job.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very satisfied with this purchase. Convenient and easy to use. It did an amazing job of cleaning the carpet and pulling up a grease spot. Read previous reviews and any negative ones resulted from not emptying it after each use. With this unit, as with ANY carpet cleaner, you must empty both the supply tank and the recovery tank after each use or the seals will deteriorate and the dirty water in the recovery tank will begin to ferment and stink. MY only caution is that it cleans a 6-8" diameter circle. If your dirty spot is larger, you'll have to repeat the process multiple times to clean the entire spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Logan

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product as soon as I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product as soon as I purchased it, but in less than a month it stopped taking a charge from the wall and will no longer run. I had a replacement shipped to me and the return process was easy but the second carpet cleaner lasted about as long as the first one. I purchased this cleaner because of the messes my dog makes and now I'm stuck with the messes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dombrosky

customer_reviews.title: It looks like refurbished since it has yellow glue in both water ...
customer_reviews.text: Came without original box (just regular brown box) and manual frome different model. It was very very very load with wiselinng sound and didn't pull water back from carpet. It looks like refurbished since it has yellow glue in both water tanks. By the way they bother are very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second one, this was purchased to replace the one that I had used so much it died! I was glad to be able to get such quick delivery as we had new carpet arriving sooner than expected. Within a week, our senior dog had an accident and I was able to use it. It's easy to choose the right setting, just push the correct button. The hose and attachment do a great job as well. Make sure that the tanks are fully in place when using or water will not be pulled out of the carpet as the machine is working (we found this out the hard way!).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecky Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gem. I love that it automatically gets the job done on its own, quickly. It's compact, lightweight, works extremely well and it's so easy to use. I rescued a dog from a puppy mill this summer and she was 12 days pregnant, a complete surprise. Fast forward and her 8 beautiful puppies have all found wonderful homes, she is now spayed and living a great life, but I sure did need this fabulous machine. My carpet looked a bit like polka dots of clean spaces for a while. I am so pleased with how well it works, I'm getting a full-size Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Tacomapat

customer_reviews.title: Get it together Bissell
customer_reviews.text: Great if you only need this for a few months. My first spot not stopped sucking water after about 8 months. It was under warranty and Bissell sent me a brand new one. The new one lasted about another 10 months and it suffered the same fate. I love it otherwise so I'll see if my SO can repair it. Its not a cheap machine, so for it to only work a few months is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: leaks poo water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: the soiled water tank leaked on the first one ordered the very first time we tired it. Amazon sent a replacement unit. Tired the second unit and the soiled water tank leaked on the first time using it..... If you want puppy poo water leaking everywhere this is the model for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: This spotbot was one of the best purchases we ever made! Much more effective than trying to clean the carpets ourselves. Gets the stains right up and we like that there is options for set in stains and surface stains. Only thing that we had to get used to is that it leaves the floor a little wetter than you would expect when it's all done. But it dries within several hours. Totally worth the money though!
customer_reviews.author: Runner girl

customer_reviews.title: good little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that unfortunately throws up often. This carpet cleaner does a very good job cleaning the spots Prince leaves behind. The only issue I have is the cleaner leave a circle on the floor so I have to go behind the cleaner with the hose/stair attachment to even out the circles.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ramey

product_meta.title: SpotBot Pet handsfree Spot and Stain Cleaner with Deep Reach Technology 33N8
product_meta.description: BISSELL's new Deep Reach Technology delivers solution further into the carpet where the deepest part of the stain resides. Strong and powerful suction cleans from the bottom up. SpotBot Pet does the work for you with its handsfree cycles. This efficient deep cleaner uses the Automatic Smart System to deliver the right amount of solution just select the type of stain and enjoy the freedom to WalkAway leaving the SpotBot Pet to do the hard work for you!
feature_bullets: Every BISSELL purchase helps save pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Get rid of messes without getting your hands dirty. This hands free portable carpet cleaner does all the scrubbing for you
Preset cleaning cycles that automatically spray, brush, and suction to permanently remove both surface and tough set-in pet stains. Just push the button to clean.
Equipped with two hands-free cleaning modes, quick clean for fresh stains and deep clean for set in stains, so you can get the right level of cleaning
Includes trial-size Pet Stain & Odor, Pet Oxy Boost Formula and a 3" tough stain tool. Hose length - 5 feet

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,869 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Tough Stain Tool, Pet Stain & Odor, Pet Oxy Boost
